name: py-marshmallow

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
marshmallow is an ORM/ODM/framework-agnostic library for converting
complex datatypes, such as objects, to and from native Python datatypes.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-dataclasses-json
dependent_to.description: Easily serialize dataclasses to and from JSON.

dependent_to.name: py-webargs
dependent_to.description:
Python library for parsing and validating HTTP request objects, with
built-in support for popular web frameworks, including Flask, Django,
Bottle, Tornado, Pyramid, Falcon, and aiohttp.

dependent_to.name: py-httpstan
dependent_to.description: HTTP-based REST interface to Stan, a package for Bayesian inference.
